snippet.title: Melco Crown Entertainment is Now Oversold (MPEL)
snippet.description: Legendary investor Warren Buffett advises to be fearful when others are greedy, and be greedy when others are fearful. One way we can try to measure the level of fear in a given stock is through a technical analysis indicator called the Relative Strength Index, or RSI, which measures momentum [...] read »

snippet.title: Michelin Crowns The Best New French Restaurant
snippet.description: L’Assiette Champenoise is a family-run restaurant in a charming old mansion in the town of Tiqueux, near Reims, the capital of the Champagne region. Its chef, Arnaud Lallement, was alone in winning the highest distinction - the coveted third star - bestowed by France’s gastronomy oracle, the Michelin Guide, in its [...] read »

snippet.title: Does The Tesla Model S Deserve To Wear Consumer Reports' Crown?
snippet.description: Tesla Motors' stock has been booming. Now comes one of the most valuable endorsements in the car business. On Tuesday, Consumer Reports magazine named the Tesla Model S as its best-reviewed car for 2013. The Model S scored highest on Consumer Reports' annual automobile ranking, landing as one of the magazine's [...]

snippet.title: Aided By One Of The World's Largest TV Screens, Demand For 2014 Kentucky Derby Tickets Is Up
snippet.description: Since 1875, The Kentucky Derby has been run consecutively, which makes it the only part of the triple crown that can make that claim. Over the last 139 years, while a lot about the Kentucky Derby has changed, a lot has stayed the same, and it can still soundly hold [...] read »

snippet.title: Apple Buyback Lets Exxon Reclaim Crown Of Biggest Dividend Payer
snippet.description: Net dividend payout was up $11.9 billion in the third quarter of 2013.

snippet.title: 'Dragon's Crown' Review (PS3/PS Vita)
snippet.description: Dragon's Crown is one of the best games of the year, boasting a vivid, colorful art style and terrific combat.
